text: Niyenjila mwitokho olwa abeenelio nibali mukhung’ang’aala, nanyoolamwo Abandu babili nibakhupananga, mulala okhurula mubandu bebe ne owundi okhurula mubasuku bebe. Kho ulia okhurula mubandu bebe namusaba mbu amukhonye khumusuku wuwe ulia. Musa namukhupa eshifusi shiokhushilifu mana namumala. Naboola mbu: “ chino ni milala khumilimo chia shetani, toto ye ni omusuku ukosinjia owahabulafu.”
